Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress Parkway/Kildare
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress Parkway, Pulaski, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress Parkway, Pulaski, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison due to police activity.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting Yellow Line Service
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are delayed due to a sick passenger on a train and a mechanical problem on another train. Update to follow.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are delayed due to a sick passenger on a train and a mechanical problem on another train. 

Personnel are working to restore service and assistance has been requested. We hope to resume service shortly.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as #97 Skokie bus service.

Updates will be posted as new information becomes available.

Allow extra travel time.
